blogPost.title: If a prominent figure posts that they purchased $GME stock or options, inducing many others to follow along, do they have an obligation to tell the same audience when they sell?
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 如果一个知名人物发帖说自己购买了GME的股票或期权，诱导很多人跟风，那么他们在卖出时是否有义务告诉同样的受众？
如果一個知名人物發帖說自己購買了GME的股票或期權，誘導很多人跟風，那麼他們在賣出時是否有義務告訴同樣的受衆？

previous.excerpt:
Some of you may have noticed that there’s a new player in the CRISPR gene
editing field, Beam Therapeutics, which IPOed last year and has rocketed from
~$20 a share to currently about ~$120 a share. Suddenly Cathie Wood of ARK is
adding it to her ARKK and ARKG funds

Meanwhile they make no money and…
